name: Arth Island
description:
Arth Island is a unique sandbox game, the mix of Don't starve and Terraria and some RPG elements
Explore a random generated world populated by dangerous creatures, build a acamp, gather resources, and craft all the items, weapons, and potion you need
YOU ARE IN A PROCEDURALLY GENERATED WORLD AND EVERYTHING IN IT IS BREACHABLE OR COLLECTABLE
TAKE ADVANTAGE OF THIS TO SURVIVE THE COLD AND DANGEROUS NIGHTS

COLLECT RESOURCES

Colete os recursos básicos para poder fazer o machado e derrubar as arvores e a picareta para quebrar as pedras.

To extract the flesh and bones of enemies and dead animals, select the empty space in the inventory and press Space to grab and place it in the grinder

EVOLUTION

hand-to-hand combat?, a shower of arrows on enemies? Or would you rather burn them with magic?
you choose which skill to perfect

3 starting weapons


Attack cadence affects all 3 classes and can be found in the talent tree
